1.title: Episode #12.1
1.plot: Nicky Campbell presents a topical debate from James Allen's Girls' School, London. He asks - Should drugs be treated like alcohol? And, is London now only for the rich?

2.title: Episode #12.2
2.plot: Nicky Campbell presents a topical debate live from the Heartlands Academy in Birmingham. Topics discussed today are - Is it right to design babies? Should museums give back other nations' treasures?

3.title: Episode #12.3
3.plot: Nicky Campbell presents today's debate live from Appleton Academy, Bradford. He asks: should gambling be made socially unacceptable? And, do some communities ignore human rights law?

4.title: Episode #12.4
4.plot: This week's topical debate come from the Oasis Academy MediaCity in Salford. The topics discussed are:- Are private schools immoral? Should Britain be afraid of its far right?

5.title: Episode #12.5
5.plot: Rachel Burden stands-in for Nicky Campbell to host a debate from the University of Sussex. Today's topics - Is social media ruining childhood? and is feminism in crisis?

6.title: Episode #12.6
6.plot: The topics discussed are:- Should surrogacy become a commercial business? Is religion good for mental health? as Nicky Campbell presents topical debate live from Lliswerry High School in Newport.
